page.title: 03FARMING(CONTINUED)
page.content:
The type of farming in the area is mixed farming, although in most cases the crops are used for animal feed. The livestock on two of the farms, {(Grounds and}Oaks),is cattle. The livestock on the third farm,{(Castle), is sheep. In one of the fields which belongs to{Castle Farm,}and which adjoins what was once the castle mere, there can be seen the remains of the quarry from which some of the red sandstone was obtained for{Kenilworth Castle.
{HIGH HOUSE FARM {High House Farm}owns 85acres. It is a dairy farm. They own or have 50 to 60 cattle. The crops they have is all grass, a ley farmery. The milk they produce is about 1400 gallons per year. They have been living or working in the busines for 5 years.
